data.name: Animals Collision - Content Pack
data.detailed_description:
"Animals Collision - Content Pack" contains additional Maps and Characters to the base game:

  • Maps: Snow 1, Snow 2, Snow 3, Desert 1, Desert 2, Desert 3, Tournament 2, Tournament 3.
  • Characters: Bear, Rabbit, Ram, Wolf.

NOTE: Some of the things are unlocked instantly, but others require "Animal Points" (earned during the game). The Instantly unlocked things cost 0 "Animal Points" but first you must click "Unlock" button. Please, check the "Extras" menu in-game for additional information!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible GPU with 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
